for nitish in range(int(input())):
    (x, y, n, s, e, w, p) = map(int, input().strip().split(' '))
    ss = x + y
    p = p - x * e - y * n
    waste = max(n + s, e + w)
    wastee = min(n + s, e + w)
    lol = p % waste
    lolol = p // waste
    loll = lol // wastee
    if p < 0:
        print(-1)
        continue
    if p == 0:
        print(ss)
        continue
    while lol % wastee != 0 and lolol >= 0:
        lolol -= 1
        lol = p - waste * lolol
        loll = lol // wastee
    if lolol >= 0 and loll >= 0 and (lolol * waste + loll * wastee == p):
        print(lolol * 2 + loll * 2 + ss)
        continue
    else:
        print(-1)
        continue

def main():
    from sys import stdin, stdout
    rl = stdin.readline
    wl = stdout.write
    int1 = int
    str1 = str
    r1 = range
    t = int1(rl())
    for i in r1(t):
        (x, y, n, s, e, w, p) = [int1(x) for x in rl().split()]
        c = n * y + e * x
        if c > p:
            wl('-1\n')
        elif c == p:
            wl(str1(x + y) + '\n')
        else:
            cs = sorted([n + s, e + w], reverse=True)
            ca = p - c
            j = 0
            while ca % cs[0] != 0:
                ca -= cs[1]
                j += 2
                if ca == 0:
                    wl(str1(x + y + j) + '\n')
                if ca < 0:
                    wl('-1\n')
                    break
            if ca > 0:
                j += 2 * int1(ca / cs[0])
                wl(str1(x + y + j) + '\n')
main()

t = int(input())
for i in range(0, t):
    (x, y, x1, x2, x3, x4, p) = map(int, input().split(' '))
    c = 0
    j = 0
    ans = 1000000000
    i = 0
    while p - x1 * y - x3 * x - (x1 + x2) * i >= 0 and i <= 1000000:
        if (p - x1 * y - x3 * x - (x1 + x2) * i) % (x3 + x4) == 0:
            j = (p - x1 * y - x3 * x - (x1 + x2) * i) // (x3 + x4)
            c += 1
            ans = min(ans, x + y + 2 * (i + j))
        i += 1
    if c == 0:
        print(-1)
    else:
        print(ans)
